Constructor Detail

HostList

public HostList(javax.swing.JDialog parent)
Constructs an instance of the HostList with the given parent and initializes the UI for the host list. calling getFtpHost() will show the dialog and wait until the user clicks ok() or cancel().

Parameters:
parent - The parent JDialog
Method Detail

initListeners

protected void initListeners()
Adds listeners to any components that need them

getFtpHost

public FtpHost getFtpHost()
This method makes the dialog popup and the user must select ok or cancel upon clicking ok, the selected FtpHost will be returned upon cancel, a null will be returned.
